title: Installation
text:
This package is not published on CRAN.
To use it locally:

Clone the GitHub repository
Open the project in RStudio
Load the package with:

devtools::load_all()
The package is now ready to be used.

title: Examples
Examples
Examples
text:
Convert from a reference currency
head(
  convert_from_reference(
    amount = 100, 
    ref_currency = "CHF",
    currency_data = currency_data
  )
)
This returns a table with :

reference currency,
target currency,
currency name,
converted amount.

title: Overview
text:
currencypackage provides simple and reusable tools to load currency data and perform currency conversions.
It was developed as part of the Data and Code Management group project and is used by the dashboard application.



Load a processed currency dataset
Convert an amount between two currencies
Convert an amount from a reference currency to all others
